message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its features and your potential return on investment, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. My maximum willingness to pay is $13,000.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a competitive price. While I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and your initial offer was quite a bit below value, I'm willing to come down to $13,800. I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the product's true worth.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my research and considering the market value, I believe $13,500 is a reasonable price for the product. I hope we can agree on this.
